original_text: Eliezer son of Dodavahu of Mareshah prophesied against Jehoshaphat, saying, “Because you have made an alliance with Ahaziah, the Lord will destroy what you have made.” The ships were wrecked and were not able to set sail to trade.
korean_text: 마레사 사람 도다와후의 아들 엘리에셀이 여호사밧을 향하여 예언하여 이르되 왕이 아하시야와 교제하므로 여호와께서 왕이 지은 것들을 파하시리라 하더니 이에 그 배들이 부서져서 다시스로 가지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: Eliezer son of Dodavahu of Mareshah
Because you have made an alliance with Ahaziah
the Lord will destroy what you have made
and were not able to set sail to trade
sentences.korean_translation: 무역하기 위해 항해할 수 없게 되었다
